title: Defenders Quest (GOG) (Latest Version With 1.1.21 Patch)
description:
Hey guys, here defender quest gog version. It the latest version with the 1.1.21 patch. It includes gog bonus contest as well as the Super Space Defenders official mod. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed. Game info and change log below.


1.1.21: 

--Fixed memory leaks 
--Battle transition now optional 
--Fixed freeze on first run 
--Fixed wrong character count in saves 

1.1.17: 

--SECRETS!!!!! 
--Better localization support 
--Added Czech translation (Beta) 
--Fixed missing text glitches 
--Fixed checkbox in shop screen 
--Fixed text overlapping on skill screen

Tower defense meets RPG! Your characters level up, use equipment, and gain in magical power or combat prowess!
Features hundreds of uniquely designed battles over 47 maps!
Whether you are a veteran or just starting out, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be sure to find just the right amount of challenge for your skill level!



Things were going well for Azra, the sheltered Royal Librarian. There were books to sort, dust, and put away, important royal documents to transcribe. All this was swept away by the deadly plague that devastated the Kingdom of Ash. The plague killed quickly, so quickly that no one has the time to bury the dead, instead they are thrown, without ceremony, into the Pit. Azra, infected with the plague, is cast into the Pit. Soon, she finds herself in the Half-Way World, the place between life and death and learns of her true power--that of being able to bring anyone into the Half-Way World with her. Now, she must traverse the Pit in the hopes of finding the cause of the plague and must fight to not only save herself but the Kingdom as well.

DefenderÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Quest is a tower defense and RPG hybrid that features classic tower defense gameplay intermingled with RPG mechanics. Recruit your troops and pick the ones that best fit your needs as youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have a wide variety to choose from: berserkers, archers, healers, mages, and many more. Upgrade their skills, items, and abilities and watch your party grow in power.
